guild.delete: I was removed from the guild [guildName] :(

description.line1: The user '[fakeTag]' (ID: [fakeId]) was found using a fake nick, though I couldn't kick them out because I don't have such permission.
description.line2: If you wanna disable my Anti-Fake module, use the command `[prefix]config antifake disable`

fakemember.title: Oops, [username]
fakemember.description: This server doesn't accept fakes. Please, alter your username in order to solve the problem :)

embed.title: Oops, [username]
embed.description: Hi! Currently we're switching guilds. Please, enter our new guild by clicking **[aqui]([link])** :)

errors.emojiError: I need the `[externalEmojis]` permission in order for me to function. Please, request an admin to have it activated so that I can work :)
errors.linkError: I need the `[sendLinks]` permission in order for me to function. Please, request an admin to have it activated so that I can work :)
errors.dmError: Sorry, but I can't send direct messages yet :(
errors.commandNotFound: Oops, I couldn't find the command `[command]`. Did you mean something like `[alt]`?

mention.title: Who's calling me?
mention.line1: Oh, hello [username], how are you? My name is [me].
mention.line2: Well, if you wanna know my job, it is to help your server in many creative and different ways!
mention.line3: Maybe you don't know my prefix on this server and that's why you pinged me. If thatÂ´s your question, it's `[prefix]`.
mention.line4: If you have any suggestions or found any loose ends, join my [support server]([url]) to talk with my creator.
mention.line5: If you wanna add me to your server, just click [aqui]([url])!
mention.line6: And finally, thanks for messaging me. It was great to explain who I am <3

status.7: Did you know that I'm OpenSource? No? Then use the command "git" and help my creator with my improvements ;)
status.10: Preciso de ajuda! Use o comando "vote" e vote em mim para me ajudar a crescer. Obrigada :)
